data.event: The county was formed on January 15, 1851 and named after Benjamin Franklin.

event.title: five days in mid-July, the Franklin County Fair is held

data.event: Held annually for five days in mid-July, the Franklin County Fair is held on the fairgrounds located on the west side of Hampton.
Traditionally, grandstand entertainment begins on Wednesday with the Barnes PRCA Rodeo.

event.title: 2007 such names as Terri Clark, Marshall Tucker Band, and Trent Tomlinson & Danielle Peck brought

data.event: In 2007 such names as Terri Clark, Marshall Tucker Band, and Trent Tomlinson & Danielle Peck brought fans to the grandstand.

event.title: Sunday the Figure 8 Races generally fill

data.event: On Sunday the Figure 8 Races generally fill the grandstand.
